property.name: Hide suggest dialogs when they lose focus
Warn the user before navigating away from an unsaved form

property.content: ################################## ## BROWSE MENU ################################## #xwikitopmenuentrystart($xwiki.getDocument('data.AllData').getURL() $services.localization.render('Browse') 'tmBrowse' '' 'folder-open') #if (!$isGuest) #submenuitem($xwiki.getDocument('data.AllData').getURL() $services.localization.render('My patients') 'tmBrowseMy', '', 'file') #submenuitem($xwiki.getDocument('data.AllData').getURL() $services.localization.render('Patients shared with me') 'tmBrowseAll', '', 'share') ## TODO: Add extension point here #else #submenuitem($xwiki.getDocument('data.AllData').getURL() $services.localization.render('Public data') 'tmBrowseAll', '', 'share') #end #xwikitopmenuentryend()

################################## ## CREATE MENU ################################## #if($displayCreateMenu) #set ($displayCreateSubmenu = $hasCreatePage) #if ($displayCreateSubmenu)
  • #xwikisplitbuttonentrystart($doc.getURL('create') $services.localization.render('core.menu.create') 'tmCreate' 'btn-success' 'plus') #if ($hasCreatePage) ###submenuitem($doc.getURL('create') $services.localization.render('Patient record') 'tmCreatePatient', '', 'notes-2') ###submenuitem($doc.getURL('create') $services.localization.render('Family') 'tmCreatefamily', '', 'flowchart') ## TODO: Add extension point here
  • ## #if ($xwiki.exists('PhenoTips.StudyBindingClass')) ## Is there more than one sheet option? ## Check out all the groups this user is part of #set ($studiesVisibilityPreference = $xwiki.getDocument('XWiki.XWikiPreferences').getObject('XWiki.ConfigurationClass', 'property', 'study-visibility-option', false).getProperty('value').value) #if ($studiesVisibilityPreference == 'unrestricted') #set ($studyClassName = 'PhenoTips.StudyClass') #set ($studyTemplateName = 'PhenoTips.StudyTemplate') #set ($query = $services.query.xwql("from doc.object(${studyClassName}) as std where doc.fullName <> :template").bindValue('template', $studyTemplateName)) #set ($studyDocs = $xwiki.wrapDocs($query.execute())) #set ($studies = $collectionstool.sortedSet) #foreach ($study in $studyDocs) #set ($discard = $studies.add($services.model.serialize($study.documentReference, 'default'))) #end #else #set ($toProcess = $collectionstool.queue) #set ($discard = $toProcess.add($xcontext.userReference.toString())) #set ($groups = []) #set ($studies = $collectionstool.sortedSet) #foreach ($iteration in [0..1000]) #if ($toProcess.empty) #break #end #set ($item = $toProcess.poll()) #foreach ($group in $xwiki.wrapDocs($xwiki.rightsmanager.getAllGroupsNamesForMember($item))) #set ($groupObj = $group.getObject('PhenoTips.PhenoTipsGroupClass')) #if (!$groupObj && $group.documentReference.name.endsWith(' Administrators')) #set ($groupObj = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($stringtool.removeEnd($group.documentReference.name, ' Administrators'), $group.documentReference.parent)).getObject('PhenoTips.PhenoTipsGroupClass')) #end #if ($groupObj && !$groups.contains($group.documentReference.toString())) #set ($discard = $toProcess.add($group.documentReference.toString())) #set ($discard = $groups.add($escapetool.sql($group.documentReference.toString()))) #if ($groupObj.getProperty('studies').value.isEmpty() == false) #set ($discard = $studies.addAll($groupObj.getProperty('studies').value)) #end #end #end #end #end #if ($studies.size() > 0) $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.StudyBindingClass')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.StudyBindingClass')## #end #end ## Extensions displayed before the content #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions('org.phenotips.newPatientForm')) #end

#macro(process_uix_param_as_list $uix $param_name $output) #set ($value = $!{uix.parameters.get($param_name)}) #if ("$!{value}" == '') #setVariable("$output", []) #else #setVariable("$output", $value.split(",")) #end #end ## ## ## #macro(uiextension_point_content $uixpt_id $generated_content) #set ($generated_content = $NULL) #set ($uixpt_content = '') #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions($uixpt_id)) #process_uix_param_as_list ($e "includeSpaces" $includeSpaces) #process_uix_param_as_list ($e "excludeSpaces" $excludeSpaces) #process_uix_param_as_list ($e "includePages" $includePages) #process_uix_param_as_list ($e "excludePages" $excludePages) #process_uix_param_as_list ($e "includeActions" $includeActions) #process_uix_param_as_list ($e "excludeActions" $excludeActions) #process_uix_param_as_list ($e "includeXClasses" $includeXClasses) #process_uix_param_as_list ($e "excludeXClasses" $excludeXClasses) #if ($includedXClasses.size() == 0) #set ($hasIncludedXObject = true) #else #set ($hasIncludedXObject = false) #foreach ($xclass in $includedXClasses) #if ($doc.getObject($xclass)) #set ($hasIncludedXObject = true) #end #end #end #set ($hasExncludedXObject = false) #foreach ($xclass in $excludedXClasses) #if ($doc.getObject($xclass)) #set ($hasExcludedXObject = true) #end #end #if ( (!$excludeActions.contains($xcontext.action) && ($includeActions.size() == 0 || $includeActions.contains($xcontext.action))) && (!$excludePages.contains($doc.fullName) && ($includePages.size() == 0 || $includePages.contains($doc.fullName))) || (!$hasExncludedXObject && $hasIncludedXObject) || (!$excludeSpaces.contains($doc.space) && ($includeSpaces.size() == 0 || $includeSpaces.contains($doc.space))) ) #set ($uixContent = $services.rendering.render($e.execute(), 'xhtml/1.0').trim()) #set ($uixpt_content = $uixpt_content.concat($uixContent)) #end #end $uixpt_content.trim() #setVariable ("$generated_content" $uixpt_content.trim()) #end ## ## ## #macro(uiextension_point $uixpt_id $in_wiki_syntax) ##set ($generated_content = '') #uiextension_point_content ($uixpt_id $generated_content) #if ($in_wiki_syntax) {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}$generated_content{{/html}} #else $generated_content #end #end ## ## ## #set ($canShare = $canView && $xwiki.exists('XWiki.SharePage') && !$isGuest)
#if($hasEdit && !$isReadOnly) ## Compute the default edit mode #set($editaction = $doc.getDefaultEditMode()) ## ## Edit menu ## ## By default there is just an edit button for the document ## If more edit options are available for this document, make the menu a dropdown #set ($dropdownContent = '') ###foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions('org.phenotips.contentMenu.edit')) #xwikisplitbuttonentrystart($doc.getURL($editaction, $!languageparams) $services.localization.render('core.menu.edit') 'tmEdit' 'btn-primary' 'pencil') #submenuitem($doc.getURL($editaction, $!languageparams) $services.localization.render('Patient record') 'tmEditInline', '', 'list-alt') ## Extensions displayed after the content #uiextension_point('my.test.point') ## Ext done #submenuitem($doc.getURL('edit', 'editor=rights') $services.localization.render('Access rights and collaborators') 'tmEditRights', '', 'lock') ## TODO add UIX point here #xwikibuttonentryend() #if($keyboardShortcutsEnabled) #end #end ## ## Actions menu ## #if($displayMoreActionsMenu && !$doc.isNew()) #xwikibuttonentrystart('' $services.localization.render('core.menu.moreactions') 'tmMoreActions' 'btn-default' 'cog') ## Export #submenuitem('' $services.localization.render('core.menu.export') 'tmExport', '', 'download-alt', 'data-toggle="modal" data-target="#exportModal"') ## Share by email #if ($canShare) #submenuitem($xwiki.getURL($doc.documentReference, 'view', 'viewer=share') $services.localization.render('core.menu.share') 'tmActionShare', '', 'envelope') #userPicker_import() $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.SharePage') $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.SharePage') #end ## ---------------------------- ## Display the shortcuts ## ---------------------------- #if($displayShortcuts) #submenuseparator() #template("shortcuts.vm") #end #xwikibuttonentryend() ## Export modal

$services.localization.render('core.menu.export')

$services.localization.render('core.menu.export.pdf') #if($hasAdmin) $services.localization.render('Export JSON') #if ("$!xwiki.getPlugin('package')" != '') $services.localization.render('core.menu.export.xar') #end #end
#end

################################## ## USER MENU ################################## ## LOGIN #if (!$xcontext.action.startsWith('login') && $isGuest) #set ($loginurl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogin', 'login', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.relativeRequestURL)")) #xwikitopmenuentry($!loginurl $!services.localization.render('login') 'tmLogin') #end ## REGISTER #if ($isGuest && $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('register', 'XWiki.XWikiPreferences')) #set ($regurl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.Register', 'register')) #xwikitopmenuentry($!regurl $!services.localization.render('core.register') 'tmRegister') #end ## ## #if (!$isGuest) #if ($isSuperAdmin) #xwikitopmenuentrystart('', $!services.localization.render('superadmin'), 'tmUser', 'navbar-avatar', 'user', '') ## LOGOUT #set ($logouturl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogout', 'logout', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.relativeRequestURL)")) #xwikitopmenuentry($!logouturl $!services.localization.render('logout') 'tmLogout', '', 'log-out') #xwikitopmenuentryend() #else #getUserAvatarURL($xcontext.user, $currentUserAvatar, 32) #if($currentUserAvatar.specified) #set($currentUserAvatar = "#smallUserAvatar($xcontext.user)") #set($userGlyphIcon = '') #else #set($currentUserAvatar = "") #set($userGlyphIcon = 'user') #end #xwikitopmenuentrystart($xwiki.getURL($xcontext.user, 'view') "$services.localization.render('core.menu.type.profile')__SEPARATOR__$!xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false)" 'tmUser' 'navbar-avatar' $userGlyphIcon $currentUserAvatar) #submenuitem($xwiki.getURL($xcontext.user, 'view') $services.localization.render('core.menu.profile') 'tmProfile', '', 'user') #submenuitem($xwiki.getURL($xcontext.user, 'view', 'category=preferences') $services.localization.render('core.menu.userPreferences') 'tmUserPreferences', '', 'wrench') #if ($hasWatch) #submenuitem($xwiki.getURL($xcontext.user, 'view', 'category=watchlist') $services.localization.render('core.menu.watchlist.management') 'tmWatchlistManager', '', 'eye-open') #submenuitem($xwiki.getURL($xcontext.user, 'view', 'category=network') $services.localization.render('core.menu.network') 'tmUserNetwork', '', 'globe') #end #if ($isWikiUIAvailable && $isMainWikiUser) #submenuitem($xwiki.getURL($xcontext.user, 'view', 'category=wikis') $services.localization.render('platform.wiki.menu.userwikis') 'tmUserWikis', '', 'list') #end ## ADMIN #if ($hasGlobalAdmin) #submenuseparator() #set ($adminwikiaction = $!xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiPreferences', 'admin')) #set ($importaction = $!xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiPreferences', 'import')) #if ($isAdminAppInstalled) #submenuitem($adminwikiaction $services.localization.render('core.menu.admin') 'tmAdminWiki', '', 'cog') #else #submenuitem($importaction $services.localization.render('core.menu.admin') 'tmAdminWiki' '' 'cog') #end #end ## LOGOUT #submenuseparator() #set ($logouturl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogout', 'logout', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.relativeRequestURL)")) #xwikitopmenuentry($!logouturl $!services.localization.render('logout') 'tmLogout', '', 'log-out') #xwikitopmenuentryend() #end #end

################################ ## MENU VIEW ################################ #if ($isInServletMode)## Visible only in a page #template("menus_macros.vm")
## Top Menu #xwikitopmenustart()
## Right menu #xwikitopmenurightstart() #template("quicksearch.vm") #template("menus_language.vm") #template("menus_user.vm") #xwikitopmenurightend()
## Left menu #xwikitopmenuleftstart() #template("menus_browse.vm") #template("menus_create.vm") #xwikitopmenuleftend()
## End of Top Menu #xwikitopmenuend() #end
